LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.label: Rice crafting spot
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.description: Work place to process agricultural crops and by-products.

LanguageData.ThreshingMachine.label: Threshing machine
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine.description: 【Role: Threshing】\n Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to Momi.\n Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Blueprint.label: Threshing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Blueprint_Install.label: Threshing machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Frame.label: Threshing machine (building)
LanguageData.ThreshingMachine_Frame.description: 【Role: Threshing】\n Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to Momi.\n Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry.label: Rice stone slurry
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry.description: 【Process: Separate】\n Agricultural tools for threshing rice to produce brown rice. Working efficiency is poor as it is working by hand.
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Blueprint.label: Rice stone slurry (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Blueprint_Install.label: Rice stone slurry (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Frame.label: Rice stone slurry (building)
LanguageData.RiceStoneSlurry_Frame.description: 【Role: Separate】\n Agricultural tools to consume Momi and convert it to Brown rice.\n Efficiency in order to do by human power is bad.
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine.label: Rice milling machine
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine.description: 【Role: Separate,Polish】\n Agricultural tools to consume Brown rice and convert it to White rice.\n Machine which was born only for the desire to eat delicious white rice.
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Blueprint.label: Rice milling machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Frame.label: Rice milling machine (building)
LanguageData.RiceMillingMachine_Frame.description: 【Role: Separate,Polished rice】\n Agricultural tools to consume Brown rice and convert it to White rice.\n Machine which was born only for the desire to eat delicious white rice.
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.label: All-purpose rice processing machine
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.description: 【Role: Threshing,Separate,Polish】\n Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to White rice.
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine_Frame.label: All-purpose rice processing machine (building)
LanguageData.ThreshingRiceMillingMachine_Frame.descri: 【Role: Threshing,Separate,Polish】\n Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to White rice.
